item.title: Chicago has lost its mind
item.description: The city’s fiscal situation is dire, and Mayor Brandon Johnson is determined to make things worse.

item.title: America cannot control China’s economic outcomes
item.description: Years into a broad trade war, evidence shows export controls would be more effective.

item.title: Seizing Venezuelan oil tankers could backfire on Trump
item.description: More legally defensible than blowing up boats, but that doesn’t make it a good idea or policy.

item.title: I came from Somalia at 19. Let me tell you about the America I met.
item.description: President Trump’s anti-immigrant ranting betrays the Americans who welcome the stranger.

item.title: Here’s the key to making GLP-1s more affordable
item.description: To democratize access to these weight-loss drugs, we need flexible, employer-driven solutions.

item.title: The hunting tradition that explains Pennsylvania’s wild politics
item.description: To understand this critical swing state, you must understand bear camp.

item.title: In Bondi Beach, an act of courage exposes cowardice
item.description: An antisemitic attack in Australia shows the scourge of antisemitism is global.

item.title: Don’t read too much into the Miami upset
item.description: Readers respond to Post articles and commentary.

item.title: In this Supreme Court case, a sledgehammer is better than a scalpel
item.description: On Trump’s ability to fire the heads of agencies, the Supreme Court should take the harder route.

item.title: This alliance has become transactional. Here’s how to repair it.
item.description: As the transatlantic alliance shifts, Trump’s tough love is no reason to get in bed with China.
